useCase.name: Edit Job Opening Details
useCase.description: User edits the details of a job opening
useCase.trigger: User selects option to edit a job opening

mainSequence.step: System requests input for a job reference
System shows Job Opening details and asks if the user wants to update the description
System asks if the user wants to update the address
System asks if the user wants to update the Mode
System asks if the user wants to update the Contract Type
System asks if the user wants to update the job title
System asks if the user wants to update the number of vacancies
System requests user for new values to update
System displays updated Job Opening and shows operation success
